sect1.title: CountDownCommitBarrier
sect1.para: The CountDownCommitBarrier is a CommitBarrier implementation comparable to the java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch where all pending transactions can continue when the configured number of parties have arrived.

sect1.title: VetoCommitBarrier
sect1.para: The VetoCommitBarrier is a CommitBarrier implementation where all pending transactions can continue when one of the Transactions veto's the VetoCommitBarrier to open.
